ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 81
ygData.msgSnippet: Sadly its true. THe taunts for all the hybrid tanks maxes out at about 160.  It only makes sense that the pure warrior is the best taunter though.  I use DoTs
ygData.messageBody:
Sadly its true.

THe taunts for all the hybrid tanks maxes out at about 160. It only makes
sense that the pure warrior is the best taunter though. I use DoTs and
Disease Cloud (yes you read that right) to instill agro. Mobs hate that
cheesy lvl 1 necro spell and the spells I stack on them help me turn them to
me as well. I have to admit though, I am no where near as good a taunter as
my companion warrior. I never said we were perfect :}

Xillith
Rallos Zek
